title: Braum ward jump!

replies.body: he already has his shield. if braum gets a ward hop he can just shield everything and hop away, which is pretty stupid for a support.

If he was alone then yea, he could shield everything and then hop away.
But there would be no reason to be alone when you're a support.

If you are shielding everything for an ally while they escape, then you can just hop to them afterwards anyway, so it really makes no difference in that situation.

Considering that the ability is called "Stand Behind Me" and half the effect is boosting armour and magic resist I don't think being able to ward jump really captures the spirit of Braum. (I know that he can self-cast it but I guess that just means he's a bit of a narcissist.)

If Kat Lee and Jax get one, i don't see why a less Op champ with the same ability shouldn't.

The only problem i see, is that they will stop using wards in bushes and start saving them for jumps.
